{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Hotel Bouffes d'ete|It|The Hotel Bouffes d'ete}} is a luxurious hotel that serves as the [[House of the Hearth]]'s base of operations in [[Fontaine]]. It is under the legal ownership of the [[Fatui Harbinger]] [[Arlecchino]], the "Father" of the House.<ref>{{Ref/CS|Arlecchino|Character Details}}</ref></p>}}
